title: Day 15: Prime this!
body: More priming. Not much more to report. I primed all the overspray, with help from Justin and J.R.. I also meant to send out the official Founding Membership e-mail today, but I couldn't come up with a good handout. Enter Mr. Aaron Scott (our logo designer). He took all the copy and built a great little flyer that we're going to pass out during the First Friday Artwalk on August 5th. Thanks Aaron! I hope to send out the official e-mail tomorrow. Not much else to report. More tomorrow.
author: Dan

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
oh boy!
.. have my long lost sticker handy too
i asked off work.. for artwalk
so ill definately be stopping by

comments.author: Godard
comments.body: I have been eagerly awaiting the opening for some time now.  I applaud your efforts.  A buddy and I tried to start a Springfield area arts review bi-monthly magazine, but after the planning meeting and a couple of bottles of vino we decided it would be too much work.  All that to say, I am pleased that someone around here has the capacity to chase their ambition with action.

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: Seems like ages since I was last here, and I've missed out on SOOO much. I've only got a short time at a computer, so I've had to skim read. The 'Founding Members' scheme sounds very exciting. So typical that I'm without a computer just when things start moving so quickly. Keep up the good work, and I hope to pop in again soon!
